abstract: Betting that the long-frozen credit markets are starting to thaw, Apollo Management, TPG Capital and the Blackstone Group have agreed in principle to buy about $12.5 billion of loans from Citigroup.
snippet: Betting that the long-frozen credit markets are starting to thaw, Apollo Management, TPG Capital and the Blackstone Group have agreed in principle to buy about $12.5 billion of loans from Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: Private equity moguls are doubling down  on their own takeovers.

headline.main: Citi Is Said to Be Near Deal to Sell $12.5 Billion of Loans
